body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jason Perry and the customer's name is Evelyn Harris.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Fine Pawns Pawn Shop. My name is Jason Perry, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Evelyn! How can I assist you with your pawning or buying needs today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some concerns about privacy when it comes to pawning my items.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Evelyn. Privacy is very important to us. May I ask, what specific information are you concerned about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I want to know how you protect my personal data.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We take your privacy seriously and use secure systems to protect your information. Could I also grab two quick pieces of information from you for our records? Could I have your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s July seventh, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could I also have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three zero three, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you so much, Evelyn! I appreciate your time, and if you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out.
